mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.user
Class ClientInitializer

java.lang.Object
  mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.IdolInitializer
      mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.user.ConsoleBrowserInitializer
          mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.user.ClientInitializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityInitializer
public final class ClientInitializer
extends ConsoleBrowserInitializer

ClientInitializer initializes an IDOL client Entity. This client is a user agent, a browser, with a command console, a GUI and a ZUI.

_TZ

private static final TimeZone _TZ
The time zone.

BUG- It's always UTC. It should be the local TZ or it should come from a Properties.

_commentPattern

private static final Pattern _commentPattern
Identifies comments in console input.

A comment is any line in which the first non-whitespace character is a '#'. handleCommand uses _commentPattern.

initialize_custom

protected void initialize_custom(Properties p)
                          throws EntityInitializer.InitializationException
Schedule the fetching of a Receptor from a directory server if one is specified in p. The property idol.directory.address contains the address of the directory server. The property idol.directory.contactport contains the directory server contact port. If both are non-null and together they represent a valid host, then initialize_custom requests a ConsumerViewInterpreter from that server.

Overrides:
initialize_custom in class ConsoleBrowserInitializer
Parameters:
p - the special Properties of this ClientInitializer
Throws:
EntityInitializer.InitializationException
